attributes.action: The dire situation facing Zimbabweans requires an urgent international response
attributes.additional_details:
The people of Zimbabwe have suffered immensely under Zanu PF misrule, the nation has been turned into a private enterprise with the citizens being reduced to mere bystanders. 

http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/world-africa-35500820
https://www.newsday.co.zw/2016/01/22/council-destroys-settlement-ahead-of-mugabe-return/
https://www.newsday.co.zw/2015/12/01/amhvoicesagric-inputs-must-be-distributed-fairly/
http://www.theindependent.co.zw/2015/10/17/grace-mugabe-abuses-98m-facility/
attributes.background: Millions are faced with homelessness, hunger as a direct result of partisan distribution of inputs, a failing economy due to gross mismanagement and an increasingly tense political atmosphere. The women and children of Zimbabwe are perishing by the day, Help is needed now before its too late.

rejection.details: We can't accept your petition in its current form as it does not call for a clear action from the UK Government and Parliament. You could start a new petition calling for the UK Government to work with the governments of other countries to assist the people of Zimbabwe.
